text: Chris Poland (born December 1st, 1957) is an American guitarist. He is best known for being the former guitarist for the thrash metal band Megadeth. Since 2002, Poland has been the guitarist for the bands OHM and OHMphrey. == Discography == === Solo albums === * 1990: Return to Metalopolis * 2000: Chasing the Sun * 2000: Rare Trax (compilation) * 2007: Return to Metalopolis Live (live) * 2019: Resistance * 2020: Return to Metalopolis 30th Anniversary Edition === With Megadeth === * 1985: Killing Is My Business... and Business Is Good! * 1986: Peace Sells... But Who's Buying? * 1990: Rust in Peace (Poland's solos appear on the demo recordings of "Holy Wars... The Punishment Due", "Take No Prisoners", and "Rust in Peace...
